extendedInfo.description: Fully control WinampÂ® over WLAN ! Access to playlist and Media Library.* Access your playlist and Media-Library. Search and browse your Media Libray by albums, artists and playlists. Enqueue new songs to playlist from your phone. Switch to saved playlist or enqeue all songs from artist or album. You can even edit the playlist on phone.* Standard playback control, shuffle, repeat and rating* Play a custom ringtone in WinampÂ® at incoming phone call, pause on active call* Just download WinampÂ®-Plugin at http://android.malzner.net to your PC. No external server program required, integrates seemlessly in WinampÂ®Winamp is a trademark of AOL Inc.

reviews.title: Works beautifully
reviews.comment: This app controls winamp perfectly and with no delays. It requires a plugin in winamp on your computer, but once you do that, it\'s flawless. Only thing I could think to add would be more sorting options in the library (like by genre), but other than that it\'s perfect
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: My new favorite app
reviews.comment: I run winamp all day long and this could be the greatest thing I\'ve used my phone for. Thank you thank you
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great controller app
reviews.comment: This is a great app. this is the most used app on my phone out side of message. if Yamaha had a android app for their mixers this app would become the most used app. Helps me Control what songs and play list are coming up next with out having to stay by the computer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent app, 1 minor annoyance
reviews.comment: Great app only one issue - can\'t launch or close winamp using the remote. Everything else is perfect - top app! 5 stars when launch/close functionality added!
reviews.author: Maurice McLachlan

reviews.title: Best remote control app for Winamp!
reviews.comment: All the other \"free\" apps I\'ve tried had some kind of restriction, this is the only one that lets me do everything I need with Winamp, including access to my media library. Thank you!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome but Ugly
reviews.comment: The app itself is awesome and works perfectly well. However, it does not look good at all. If there was a version with a prettier interface for money I would buy it. Just saying...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent App
reviews.comment: What a great find ... so easy to install and use; I\'ve made the mistake of using other, more clunky apps to get the simple result this one provided. Thanks so much!
reviews.author: Brian Kirchinger

reviews.title: Functional
reviews.comment: Does the basics, not hard to set up and works as described.  Lacks notifications and status bar presence. ... And that\'s where they lost me.
reviews.author: Victor Barleycorn

reviews.title: As advertised
reviews.comment: I plug my Sennheiser wireless headphones into the computer and can wander around my house and garage listening to music all controlled by my Galaxy S3.  Playlists have to be done manually but everything else is great!
reviews.author: Kevin Enns

reviews.title: excelent app
reviews.comment: This is a greaaaat app. Love it so much. Just need to download plugin in my pc then its all... so easyy
reviews.author: dhila fadhila

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: The app works great but could use a little polish. A UI makeover would make this a 5 star app. The oversized control buttons make it less likely to press the wrong one by mistake but they are pretty ugly. The dev did a great job otherwise. One thing to note: don\'t make the same mistake I did and wonder why it was not connecting. Add a Windows Firewall exception on the computer with Winamp or turn off the Windows Firewall completely if you\'re behind a home router with its own NAT firewall and don\'t need it.
reviews.author: Andrew Wescoat

reviews.title: Works great!!
reviews.comment: Works seamlessly with Nexus 7 <-> Winamp 5.6.3. Can control the music from my couch. Highly recommended!
reviews.author: Zachary Hauri

reviews.title: Awesome App!! Super easy to get working
Needs better queuing system
reviews.comment: I\'m looking for an app that will do proper file queuing - not just move the file beneath the current file in the playlist.  WinAmp has a beautiful enqueue feature (Alt+q), why can\'t this app utilize that instead of moving the song beneath the currently playing song in the playlist?  This is a pain because as you\'re looking through your playlist and finding songs to play and \"Enque\" one, the song moves from where it is in the playlist to a new location (below the currently playing song), messing up any order you have in your playlist.  It would be nice to have a separate screen with your queued songs, and allow you to move the songs around in your queue, while keeping your playlist as is and just play songs from your queued list if you create one.  Fix this and I will give it 5 out of 5...  If anyone knows of an app that will do what I\'m looking for, let me know, but this one doesn\'t do this yet, hope it will in the future...  I\'d gladly pay for that feature if it would work well.
reviews.author: Guy Lajeunesse

reviews.title: Awesome App..BUT!
reviews.comment: this is an amazing app but lacks a good widget! there are only two controls in the widget! play/pause and fwd track! :|  If the widget has all the basic controls + if the volume buttons of the phone are in sync with the app then its wonderful! Also please change the User interface!!! :D make it a little interesting! Wonderful App though! :) loved it! i always wanted an app like this! :D i would definitely give this app 5 stars if the changes are made! :)
reviews.author: Rohit Harip

reviews.title: Holy cow!
reviews.comment: This is amazing. Fired up without any hassle, intuitive, responsive, detailed... Just fantastic. Would appreciate ability to rearrange play list by drag and drop but seems wrong to quibble with such a totally amazing job. I\'ve tried lies of ways to control music on my computer but this is, by a long long way, the best, easiest and nicest to use.  Seriously, great job!
reviews.author: Ed Copley

reviews.title: Easy and quick
reviews.comment: I expected there to be some kind of difficult install but it was incredibly easy to install on my phone and install the plugin on winamp. My only slight criticism would be that it could do with a more pleasant interface but in terms of function it\'s spot on
reviews.author: Ben Jewell

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been looking for something like this for a long time. Instant control and a simple setup. Just had to allow winamp through firewall. Thanks a lot for this app!
reviews.author: Ivan Vuk

reviews.title: Almost perfect - some issues
reviews.comment: + Hidden server, no window, no tray icon, no system application, just winamp plugin. + Zero problem config and run. + Instant/on fly scroll controls. - No system notification widget. - Some (or to be specific, most of mine) of the album artwork/covers are not displayed. Can\'t find out what\'s wrong with them. - Overall app design - to be honest it\'s ugly. - No stop button, only pause
reviews.author: wolo wolson
